attributes.action: Allow a change to Deeds where a land management company does not perform.
attributes.additional_details:
Often, management companies simply do not perform. Our management company refused to install a bin because "it would not be emptied often enough" - this is what we pay them for.

We have no authority to challenge cost increases, which are enforced regularly in spite of little/no action occurring.

We have no say in works undertaken/planned.

We have no take-over rights or consultation in the appointment of the management company.

This is effectively an additional tax, albeit private.
attributes.background:
Fleeceholding is the newly formed practice of charging homeowners an additional premium to "manage" communal areas of land on a recently built housing estate.
Residents have no rights, no escalation route, no say on the management of these areas and yet are threatened to pay or face court action.
